sentences.sContent: The daffodils which challenge so proudly and splendidly the boisterous March winds are soon shriveled and defeated, limply wrinkling to remind us of the inevitable ravages of time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The daffodils which challenge so proudly and splendidly the boisterous March winds are soon shriveled and defeated, limply wrinkling to remind us of the inevitable ravages of time.
sentences.sCn: 曾经那么骄傲而辉煌地迎战三月狂暴寒风的水仙，不久就会凋零衰败，无力而皱巴巴地提醒我们由时间造成的不可避免的损害和创伤。

sentences.sContent: See the belle is giddy, limply , what disease is this?
sentences.sContent_eng: See the belle is giddy, limply , what disease is this?
sentences.sCn: 见到美女就头晕，四肢无力，这是什么病啊？

synos.tran: 柔软地；四肢无力地，软绵绵地

words.tran: 跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进
